author: Staff Reporter
text:
Wowelse, an information, communication and technology company, will launch ‘Exam Legend’, a portal aimed at helping students understand, learn, test and improve in academics.

Exam Legend or EL includes online assessment that is diagnostic in nature to identify learning gaps and focus on strong areas, says a release from the company.

This product has affiliation of 180 schools, the release says and adds that the launch will include website and Exam Legend product launch.

At present, the product will focus on State Board Class X and Plus Two students, the release adds.
title: Learning portal to be launched
